videos.headline: Panthers TE's TD catch puts Pittsburgh up 10
videos.description: Pittsburgh tight end J.P. Holtz catches a 23-yard touchdown pass from quarterback Nathan Peterman, putting the Panthers up 10-0 over Virgnia Tech.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Panthers TE's TD catch puts Pittsburgh up 10) 2015/10/03 ESHEET
